feed.title: Som Pammar
feed.subtitle: Sharing the learnings from day-to-day software development cycles

entry.title: Embed Oracle Data Visualization dashboard in Oracle Jet application

link.title: Embed Oracle Data Visualization dashboard in Oracle Jet application

entry.content:
If you are using Oracle Data Visualization and want to embed a dashboard created into a custom web application Oracle Jet, you can refer to this site. It also has a sample Oracle Jet application and a sample visualization that you can import into your Oracle DV environment.

Git hub project link - oracle-dv-embedding
entry.summary: If you are using Oracle Data Visualization and want to embed a dashboard created into a custom web application Oracle Jet, you can refer to this site. It also has a sample Oracle Jet application and a sample visualization that you can import into your Oracle DV environment.

entry.title: Oracle unexpire user password
entry.content: Recently, I came across a situation where the database user account had expired. This user account was used by docker instance and was more complicated to update the password in that instance. So I tried to find ways to keep the same password but make the account unexpired. I found this link which I thought was interesting and saved my day.
entry.summary: Recently, I came across a situation where the database user account had expired.
